en.name: Big pile of sticks
en.description: Waw, you really wanted to make that stick super useful. Well waw you got a weapon that you can sell for the big bucks.

fr.name: Grosse pile de baton de bois
fr.description: Waw, tu voulais vraiment faire utile de ce baton. Bien waw, tu as maintenant une arme que tu peux vendre pour super cher.
